document_data.name: Radium
document_data.mainbody: '''Radium''' was an elemental material found in the [[Realms]].
document_data.Availability: In {{yearlinkConvert|3520|NY}}, the [[Elemental Store]] of [[Karsus Enclave]] sold pure elemental powdered radium for 22 [[gp]] per {{SI|1|ounce|long=yes}}.
document_data.Usages: * Radium was used by the [[Netherese]] in various [[poison]]s as well as medicines.
